item.title: Creating posts with Markdown
item.description: This is a test post using the Hugo framework! This is made to be an overview of markdown and the general process of creating posts. Simple List of Markdown Commands This is bold, italic, and strikethrough text! This is an ordered list of my favourite programming languages: C Python Javascript This is an unordered list of my favourite foods: Nihari Biryani Shawarma This is a sample of C++ code along with syntax highlighting:
